name: OCKAddressButton
desc: A button with a location image, title, and detail labels.

items.name: let contentStackView: OCKStackView
items.desc: A view that contains the button’s content, and arranges its children horizontally.

items.name: let titleLabel: OCKLabel
items.desc: A label for the button that contains the primary text.

items.name: let detailLabel: OCKLabel
items.desc: A label for the button that contains supplementary text, located below the title label.

items.name: let imageView: UIImageView
items.desc: An image view in the corner of the view, with a default image set to the location icon.

items.name: func style() -> OCKStyler
items.desc: Returns an object’s custom style, the first parent with a custom style, or the default style.

items.name: func styleChildren()
items.desc: Updates the style of the child views.
